system.effect:
These extremely illegal cases hack and remove the ideometric lock of an owned Pokémon. This allows owned Pokémon to be stolen by the user, without having to take the original owner’s Poké Ball.
Balls with this case incur a -2 penalty on all Accuracy rolls, and are capable of capturing owned Pokémon. Owned Pokémon captured with this case start with 1 Friendship (if they had 1 Friendship, they instead have 0 Friendship).
